summary: This code checks if a file named "tasks.json" exists. If it does, the script proceeds to import tasks from this file; otherwise, it notifies that no such file exists and exits with an error status.

details.comment: This code checks if a file named "tasks.json" exists. If it does, the script proceeds to import tasks from this file; otherwise, it notifies that no such file exists and exits with an error status.
details.content:
# only if there is tasks.json can we import anything
if [[ -f tasks.json ]]; then
	task import < tasks.json
else
	echo there is no tasks.json
	exit 1
fi
